title: A ternary system of meloxicam with matching hydrophilic polymer and cyclodextrin for improved stability in liquid preprations
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21260-21268
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02811B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Si Li, Longfa Kou, Yimeng Qin, Yimeng Wang, Yinghua Sun, Zhonggui He, Xiaohong Liu
The purpose of the study is to investigate the effect of ternary systems consisting of meloxicam with cyclodextrins (HP-β-CD or SBE-β-CD) and different polymers (HA, HPMC and PVP) on the stability of meloxicam.
